title: Interpretation
text: There is very little information given hinting that if we know some fundamental characteristics of continuous probability distribution, we can find the probability.

title: Distributions
text: In a continuous probability distribution, the total area in the distribution is $$_{}$$.

title: Interpretation
text: The area under the curve of a continuous probability distribution is $$1$$, so the area that is outside of the curve is $$0$$.
